thread.title: John Travolta's Face Is the Big Mystery in This American Crime Story Teaser
thread.title_full: John Travolta's Face Is the Big Mystery in This American Crime Story Teaser

author: TV Guide
title: John Travolta's Face Is the Big Mystery in This American Crime Story Teaser
text: John Travolta's Face Is the Big Mystery in This American Crime Story Teaser The Juice is loose!FX released two new teaser clips Thursday for the upcoming American Crime Story: The People v. O.J. Simpson. Both videos ... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 5:08 PM Updated at 8:44 PM Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 5:08 PM Updated at 8:44 PM The Juice is loose! FX released two new teaser clips Thursday for the upcoming American Crime Story: The People v. O.J. Simpson . Both videos feature Cuba Gooding Jr. as O.J. Simpson , though we don't see his face in either. One face we do see is John Travolta 's, as Simpson's lawyer Robert Shapiro. He looks... different. See for yourself: American Crime Story will premiere in February on FX. Other Links From TVGuide.com
